pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 28, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, September 28, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

8:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the inaugural meeting of the Prime Ministerâ€™s Youth Council.

360 Albert Street
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting only
  • Media should present themselves at the lobby no later than 7:45 a.m.


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with actor and United Nations Women Goodwill Ambassador Emma Watson. 

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario 

Note for media: 

  • Pooled photo opportunity only


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Kofi Annan.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only


6:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Opening Ceremony for the One Young World Summit.

Parliament Hill Lawn
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Accreditation from the Canadian Parliamentary Press Gallery required. For more information, contact Marc Fortier at Marc.fortier@parl.gc.ca


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
